name: Jewel Flavor Breakout
description:
Break the bricks in a classic breakout Arkanoid Pong game in a horizontal setting. Collect all the jewels, defeat all enemies and advance to the next level! Try to hit the bouncing ball and deflect it with your left and right paddles. Can you defeat the end bosses in every world. Break all the bricks to get to the jewels in this breakout Arkanoid Pong style game!

- 60 cool and challenging levels and more to come!
- Defeat enemies and bosses in each world!
- Fun power ups
- Horizontal Arkanoid - Pong style game!
- Easy gameplay

Check out the full version for all the levels, bricks, enemies and boss-fights of this breakout Arkanoid Pong style game!
